translations: 未加思量的；不合理的；无理性的；不讲理的

sentences.sentence: At this moment of success I found only an unreasoning sense of futility.
sentences.translation: 在这个成功的时刻，我只能感觉到一种不理智的徒劳感。

sentences.sentence: As often happens after long sleeplessness, he was seized by an unreasoning panic.
sentences.translation: 正如长期失眠后经常发生的那样，他总是莫名其妙地惊慌。

sentences.sentence: Good sense has triumphed over unreasoning impetuosity.
sentences.translation: 清醒的理智战胜了盲目冲动的急躁情绪。
